scripts.build-android-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-staging && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform android --profile staging) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-android-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-beta && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform android --profile beta) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-android-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-android-production && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform android --profile production) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-ios-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-staging && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform ios --profile staging) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-ios-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-beta && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform ios --profile beta) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-ios-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-ios-production && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform ios --profile production) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.build-apps-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action build-apps-production && npm run remind -s && ((npm run pre-push-swap && eas build --platform all --profile production) || npm run post-push-restore)) || true
scripts.submit-android-production:
echo '

INSTRUCTIONS: Download the latest Android build from Expo and upload it to the Play Store.
'
scripts.submit-ios-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action submit-ios-production && npm run confirm -s && (eas submit --platform ios --profile production --latest)) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-staging && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && eas update --auto --branch staging && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-beta && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && eas update --auto --branch beta && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-apps-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-apps-to-production && npm run confirm -s && npm run go-push-apps-to-production) || true
scripts.go-push-apps-to-production: npm run pre-push-swap && eas update --auto --branch production && npm run post-push-restore
scripts.push-web-to-staging: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-to-staging && npm run confirm -s && npm run go-push-web-to-staging) || true
scripts.go-push-web-to-staging: npm run pre-push-swap && npx expo export --platform web && cp -r web-build-overrides/* dist && node ./scripts/fixIndexHtml.js && node ./scripts/pushWebToStaging.js && npm run post-push-restore
scripts.push-web-to-beta: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-to-beta && npm run confirm -s && npm run pre-push-swap && npx expo export --platform web && cp -r web-build-overrides/* dist && node ./scripts/fixIndexHtml.js && node ./scripts/pushWebToBeta.js && npm run post-push-restore) || true
scripts.push-web-staging-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-staging-to-production && npm run confirm -s && node ./scripts/pushWebStagingToProduction.js) || true
scripts.push-web-beta-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-web-beta-to-production && npm run confirm -s && node ./scripts/pushWebBetaToProduction.js) || true
scripts.push-all-to-production: (node ./scripts/echoActionToPerform.js --action push-all-to-production && npm run confirm -s && npm run go-push-web-to-staging && node ./scripts/pushwebstagingtoproduction.js && npm run go-push-apps-to-production) || true
scripts.remind:
read -p 'Did you update the version number and rerun change-tenant? (y/N) ' -n 1 -r && echo '
' && [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]]
